text: Eat Me, Drink Me is the sixth studio album by American rock band, Marilyn Manson. It was released on June 5, 2007. The producers of the album were Marilyn Manson and Tim Sk√∂ld. It was the last album to feature Tim Skold's contributions because he was replaced by Twiggy Ramirez in the following January. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:Marilyn Manson albums
title: Eat Me, Drink Me
